Summary: lights in the sky closer than stars, yellow vs blue glow of rest of stars. faded out one at a time. 4 witnesses
divs: Sighting Detailsfour adults sitting by the camp fire witnessed 6 or more stationary lights in the sky. looked like stars but were brighter and mor yellow orange then the blue light from the sky. we watched them for 20 seconds or more before one by one they started to fade away. weirdest thing i have ever seen!!!
